mapper.insert: insert into ssafy_member (userid, username, userpwd, email, address, joindate) values (#{userid}, #{username}, #{userpwd}, #{email}, #{address}, now())
mapper.select: select userid, userpwd, username, email, address, date_format(joindate, '%y.%m.%d') joindate from ssafy_member order by joindate desc
select count(userid) from ssafy_member where userid= #{userid}
select userid, userpwd, username, email, address, date_format(joindate, '%y.%m.%d') joindate from ssafy_member where userid like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
